---
title: "Get Account Transactions Data"
---

import { Aside } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';

`AccountTransactionsData` retrieves `transaction_version`s of transactions that affect a specified account address, ordered in descending order. `transaction_version` is a unique id given to each transaction on-chain that increases by 1 each time.

This query is essential for applications that require a historical log of transactions for audit, tracking, or display purposes.

<Aside type="note">
  Experiment and see the results! Modify the address, limit, and offset in the variables below to customize your query.
</Aside>

{/* <GraphQLEditor query={"type":"mdxJsxAttributeValueExpression","value":"`query GetAccountTransactionsData($address: String, $limit: Int) {\naccount_transactions(\n  where: { account_address: { _eq: $address } }\n  order_by: {transaction_version: desc}\n  limit: $limit\n) {\n  transaction_version\n  __typename\n}\n}`","data":{"estree":{"type":"Program","start":683,"end":935,"body":[{"type":"ExpressionStatement","expression":{"type":"TemplateLiteral","start":683,"end":935,"loc":{"start":{"line":15,"column":9,"offset":683},"end":{"line":24,"column":2,"offset":935}},"expressions":[],"quasis":[{"type":"TemplateElement","start":684,"end":934,"loc":{"start":{"line":15,"column":10,"offset":684},"end":{"line":24,"column":1,"offset":934}},"value":{"raw":"query */}

#### Variables:

- `$address`: **String** - The blockchain account address for which to query transaction data. Example: `"0x1abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef"`.
- `$limit`: **Integer** - Specifies the maximum number of transaction versions to return. Helps manage the volume of data retrieved. Example: `10`.
- `$offset`: **Integer** - The offset from which to start fetching the transaction versions. Useful for paginating results. Example: `0`.

<br />

# Getting Recent Transactions

A helpful variant of the above query limits results to just ones that happened after a specific `transaction_version`. All results will have a `transaction_version` greater than `$gt`.

{/* <GraphQLEditor query={"type":"mdxJsxAttributeValueExpression","value":"`query GetAccountTransactionsData($address: String, $limit: Int, $gt: bigint) {\naccount_transactions(\n  where: { account_address: { _eq: $address }, transaction_version: {_gt: $gt} }\n  order_by: {transaction_version: desc}\n  limit: $limit\n) {\n  transaction_version\n  __typename\n}\n}`","data":{"estree":{"type":"Program","start":1791,"end":2089,"body":[{"type":"ExpressionStatement","expression":{"type":"TemplateLiteral","start":1791,"end":2089,"loc":{"start":{"line":41,"column":9,"offset":1791},"end":{"line":50,"column":2,"offset":2089}},"expressions":[],"quasis":[{"type":"TemplateElement","start":1792,"end":2088,"loc":{"start":{"line":41,"column":10,"offset":1792},"end":{"line":50,"column":1,"offset":2088}},"value":{"raw":"query GetAccountTransactionsData($address: String, $limit: Int, $gt: bigint) {\naccount_transactions(\n  where: { account_address: { _eq: $address }, transaction_version: {_gt: $gt} }\n  order_by: {transaction_version: desc}\n  limit: $limit\n) {\n  transaction_version\n  __typename\n}\n}","cooked":"query GetAccountTransactionsData($address: String, $limit: Int, $gt: bigint) {\naccount_transactions(\n  where: { account_address: { _eq: $address }, transaction_version: {_gt: $gt} }\n  order_by: {transaction_version: desc}\n  limit: $limit\n) {\n  transaction_version\n  __typename\n}\n}"},"tail":true,"range":[1792,2088]}],"range":[1791,2089]},"start":1791,"end":2089,"loc":{"start":{"line":41,"column":9,"offset":1791},"end":{"line":50,"column":2,"offset":2089}},"range":[1791,2089]}],"sourceType":"module","comments":[],"loc":{"start":{"line":41,"column":9,"offset":1791},"end":{"line":50,"column":2,"offset":2089}},"range":[1791,2089]}}} variables={"type":"mdxJsxAttributeValueExpression","value":"`{\n\"address\": \"0xffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff\",\n\"limit\": 10,\n\"gt\": 599296148\n}`","data":{"estree":{"type":"Program","start":2104,"end":2225,"body":[{"type":"ExpressionStatement","expression":{"type":"TemplateLiteral","start":2104,"end":2225,"loc":{"start":{"line":51,"column":13,"offset":2104},"end":{"line":55,"column":2,"offset":2225}},"expressions":[],"quasis":[{"type":"TemplateElement","start":2105,"end":2224,"loc":{"start":{"line":51,"column":14,"offset":2105},"end":{"line":55,"column":1,"offset":2224}},"value":{"raw":"{\n\"address\": \"0xffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff\",\n\"limit\": 10,\n\"gt\": 599296148\n}","cooked":"{\n\"address\": \"0xffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff\",\n\"limit\": 10,\n\"gt\": 599296148\n}"},"tail":true,"range":[2105,2224]}],"range":[2104,2225]},"start":2104,"end":2225,"loc":{"start":{"line":51,"column":13,"offset":2104},"end":{"line":55,"column":2,"offset":2225}},"range":[2104,2225]}],"sourceType":"module","comments":[],"loc":{"start":{"line":51,"column":13,"offset":2104},"end":{"line":55,"column":2,"offset":2225}},"range":[2104,2225]}}}></GraphQLEditor> */}

#### Variables:

- `$address`: **String** - The blockchain account address for which to query transaction data. Example: `"0xffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff"`.
- `$limit`: **Integer** - Specifies the maximum number of transaction versions to return. This helps limit the results to a manageable size. Example: `10`.
- `$gt`: **bigint** - The transaction version number above which transactions should be fetched. A transaction version is a sequentially increasing number that increments for every transaction.
  Transaction version 0 is the first transaction (genesis transaction), and a transaction version 100 is the 101st transaction in the blockchain.
  Example: `599296148`.
